question: What is the name of the administrative center of Cēsu novads (Cēsis county) in Latvia?
asked_question_translated: Ako sa volá administratívne centrum Cēsu novads (Cēsiský okres) v Lotyšsku?
answer: Administratívnym centrom Cēsu novads (Cēsiského okresu) v Lotyšsku je mesto Cēsis.
answer_translated_eng: The administrative centre of Cēsu novads (Cēsis County) in Latvia is the town of Cēsis.
